wikipedia_page.main: William Cantelo (born 1839) was a 19th-century British inventor. Credited with developing an early machine gun, he disappeared from his home in Southampton in the 1880s. While trying to find Cantelo, his two sons saw a photograph of American-born inventor Hiram Maxim (born 1840), creator of the Maxim gun; his superficial similarity to their father led them to believe that he had re-emerged under a new name.

response: * William Cantelo, an early machine gun inventor who disappeared in the 1880s but whose family believed he had reemerged as Hiram Maxim.

link_mentions.page: List of people who disappeared mysteriously: pre-1910
